participants.name: Whitney Evans
participants.title: Business Development leader focused on partnering with innovative organizations to add talent and increase productivity

messages.message:
Web Developer Opportunity

Dear Brian, 

I wanted to reach out to you. I am working with a growing mortgage company in Scottsdale (near the Fashion Square mall) that is looking for a solid Web Developer. I saw your profile and think this would be a great opportunity for you so I wanted to reach out and see if this piques your interest. This is a full time role that does pay competitively. The company has appx 700 employees, has offices in 9 states and is growing at a steady pace. If you are interested in learning more, let me know!

Whitney Evans
480-477-3261 | whitney.evans@staffmark.com
I don't believe in mortgage companies.

Ha. Yes of course. 

Sent from my iPhone
That's terrible! You are paying for someone else's insurance policy and you aren't the beneficiary of that policy, the bank is.

Haha. I know. It's an investment for me. I'm happy with my purchase. 

Sent from my iPhone

The house is an investment, I'm sure. I had the same mentality when I first bought. The banking is just throwing away money. You should refi with a credit union and trade PMI for a 15 year mortgage. Dave Ramsey taught me that and we actually did it.

Cool. I'll look into. Thx 

Sent from my iPhone
Good! Starve the banks of business and talent!
